name: Unarmed
description: Fighting without a weapon such as punching or kicking

name: Dagger
description: A small sharpened blade that is easily hidden

name: Club
description: A thick piece of wood held in one hand

name: Greatsword
description: A large sword held in two hands

name: Mace
description: A one-handed blunt weapon with a heavy metal head

name: Spear
description: A pole with a sharpened end

name: Axe
description: A one-handed axe designed for fighting

name: Hand Crossbow
description: A small crossbow that can be held fired with one hand

name: Flintlock Pistol
description: A small fire arm fired in with one hand
